snippet: Eight villagers near Phnom Penh, the capital, were arrested Thursday for plastering President Obama’s picture on their rooftops beside spray-painted SOS messages ahead of Mr. Obama’s visit to Cambodia next week.
lead_paragraph: Eight villagers near Phnom Penh, the capital, were arrested Thursday for plastering President Obama’s picture on their rooftops beside spray-painted SOS messages ahead of Mr. Obama’s visit to Cambodia next week.

headline.main: Cambodia: Villagers Arrested Over Appeal to Obama
headline.print_headline: Cambodia: Villagers Arrested Over Appeal to Obama
